strIntroduction: Discover Prague from every perspective on this walking, sailing and minibus tour of the beautiful Czech capital. Undoubtedly one of Europe’s most spectacular and historic cities, see all of Prague’s major attractions in one trip and learn about the city’s fascinating past from your expert guide. You will take in the Old Town, the Jewish neighbourhood, Charles Bridge, the Castle area the Vltava River and much more on this memorable tour.
strTitle: The best of Prague - on foot, by bus and by boat

strIntroduction: Visit the Moravian Karst, sail the river Punkva and climb by cable car to the Upper Bridge. A view into the depths of the Macocha abyss from the Upper or Lower bridge gives us an unforgettable experience.

Travel from Brno to the nearby Blansko District to visit the Moravian Karst and the pilgrimage church in Křtiny. Take a walk through the caverns of Cave Výpustek, and learn about the top secret command post that was set up there in the 1960s.
strTitle: Cave Vypustek and the Temple of Krtiny

strIntroduction: Discover the historic buildings and haunting bone chapel of Kutna Hora, one of the most popular destinations in the Czech
strTitle: Prague Kutna Hora and Bone Chapel Tour

strIntroduction: Take a break from the busy streets of Prague to enjoy the wonderful spa town of Karlovy Vary

Renaissance ancient town of Tel?, called the Venice of Moravia, also UNESCO’s world heritage site, gives the impression of fairy-tale town. The city takes pride in having Gothic Chateau and the most picturesque town square of the country - Zacharias of Hradec Square. We will visit Tel? Chateau and the renaissance town centre.

When we talk about “The old town”, we are talking about the original historic part of Prague city. As there was near to no bombing on Prague during WWII, most of Prague’s historical centre remained undamaged.
Discover beautiful Prague, the city of a hundred spires, with this bus and boat tour that ends with a wander over the 14th century Charles Bridge.
strTitle: City tour, cruise and Charles Bridge tour

strIntroduction: Come and join a trip to the magnificent city of Dresden. Visit the capital of Saxony.

Every city in the world has a bohemian district but only in Prague does Bohemian mean something much more special. The Bohemian Prague tour covers the essence of the Czech capital, from iconic landmarks to the tastes, sights and sounds of the City of a Hundred Spires. Come along and learn all about its architecture, art, culture and people during this morning tour.
Acquaint yourself with the charms of spectacular Prague with this relaxing afternoon boat trip.
strTitle: Cruise on the Vlatava river with coffee and cake

strIntroduction: The beauty of Prague isn’t just on the outside; you’re as likely to find it inside the city’s many beer halls. This three-hour evening tour will take you to five of the best in town so you can savour some of the brews that have made Czech beer a byword for excellence.

Text your way around Prague on this tour with a twist! All you need to do is locate a local SIM card, acquire an activation code, and then get ready to meet your friendly and informative new tour guide: your mobile phone. There’s not a moment to waste as you set to work on a high-tech treasure hunt through this beautiful old city.

strTitle: Private Tour: Estoril and Cascais Day Trip from Lisbon

strIntroduction: This tour is a unique way to see and experience historical Lisbon. Insider guides give you a great insight into Lisbon’s lifestyle, history and culture as well useful tips.

Get a new perspective of Lisbon from on board a luxurious yacht on a 2-hour sunset cruise from Belém Tower, passing the Cristo Rei monument, Terreiro do Paço and Alfama along the way. Sail the calm waters of the Tagus River as the sun sets over the city.
strTitle: Lisbon: 2-Hour Sunset Cruise along the Tagus River

Enjoy Lisbon’s best belvederes and the most charismatic Fado districts of Mouraria and Alfama. Experience the sweet taste of Lisbon’s favorite liqueur – Ginjinha – in a local Fado tavern, while walking in Mouraria.
strTitle: Lisbon Sunset Small-Group Walking Tour with Fado Performance

strIntroduction: Experience the excitement of kayaking in Arrábida Natural Park on this day tour from Lisbon. Take in beautiful landscapes, explore caves and inlets, and have a picnic on a secluded beach. Later, take a tour of the amazing Sesimbra castle.

Discover the Old Town of Lisbon, the Belém district, and incomparable sights throughout the city on this tour. Then discover the romance and charm of Sintra and wander among the fairytale palace and gardens of Pena Palace.
strTitle: Lisbon and Sintra Pena Palace Tour

strIntroduction: This SIM card works in 31 different countries in Europe, provides 1250MB fast mobile internet/ data plus 300 minutes calls in 31 countries in Europe.
Stroll the historic streets of Lisbon and savor the flavors of Portuguese food on a 4-hour walking tour of the city’s diverse districts.

Visit Portugal’s prestigious Douro Valley on this full-day wine tour from Porto! Famous for its production of port wine, this UNESCO World Heritage-listed region is indisputably scenic, with swathes of vineyards clinging to the hills around the Douro River.
strTitle: Douro Valley Small-Group Tour with Wine Tasting, Portuguese Lunch and Optional River Cruise

strIntroduction: Join us on this day trip to the natural park of Arrabida and major sites of Lisbon, then enjoy two free wine tastings!

Discover more than 8,000 sea creatures from 4 ocean habitats at the Oceanário de Lisboa with a pre-booked entrance ticket. Immerse yourself in the North Atlantic, Antarctic, Temperate Pacific, and Tropical Indian Ocean.

strTitle: Caves and Dolphin Watching Cruise from Albufeira

strIntroduction: Enjoy the flavors of Portuguese cuisine on a small-group gourmet Portuguese food and wine tour of Lisbon!
strTitle: Lisbon Small-Group Gourmet Portuguese Food and Wine Tour

strIntroduction: Sintra is viewed as one of Portugal's most beautiful destinations. Join us and visit the castles such as National Palace and Pena Palace.
strTitle: Half Day Sintra & Pena Palace Tour

strIntroduction: Savor the flavors of Portugal on a delicious 2.5-hour Segway tour of Lisbon’s historic attractions and foodie destinations. Explore the city’s sights, such as Lisbon Castle, and glide through lively neighborhoods, such as the enchanting Bairro Alto.

Enjoy the natural beauty of the Lisbon area on a relaxed full-day tour. Visit 'the end of the world' at Europe's westernmost cliffs, dine on tasty local food near the National Palace in Sintra, and take a leisurely stroll by the bay in lovely Cascais.
strTitle: Sintra, Cascais, and Estoril: Full-Day Tour from Lisbon

strIntroduction: Get to know the history of Porto on this 3.5-hour walking tour with an expert local guide!

strTitle: Fátima and the Sanctuary Basilica Half Day Tour from Lisbon

strIntroduction: Explore the fun way with a canoe and horseback ride through pure and bountiful Azores nature.
strTitle: Canoeing and Horseback Riding in Sao Miguel

strIntroduction: Experience the natural and historical beauty of Portugal on a small-group day trip from Lisbon to Sintra and Cascais.
strTitle: Sintra and Cascais Small-Group Day Trip from Lisbon

strIntroduction: Take a guided drive through Porto at night, and then enjoy dinner and a Fado show in a traditional Porto restaurant.
strTitle: Porto Sightseeing Tour at Night with Fado Performance

Tagus River Sunset Cruise in Lisbon

strIntroduction: Don’t expect a “traditional” sightseeing tour but rather a memorable experience on loth land and water!

strTitle: Porto Food and Wine Tasting Tour
Small-Group Lisbon Sightseeing Tour with Fado Show and Dinner

strIntroduction: Discover some of Portugal's most sacred sites on a private 9-hour tour of the walled city of Óbidos and the Sanctuary of Fátima. Explore the gothic Monastery of Batalha. Learn the story of one of the most iconic pilgrimage sites in the Catholic world.
Get on the Madrid City Hop-on Hop-off bus, with over 30 must-see destinations, you'll get to know the city mote than you expect!

Combine gourmet food and Catalan culture on a pre-dinner walking tour of Barcelona's famous tapas bars. It's a great way to begin your visit of Barcelona - not only do you get an overview of this fabulous city, you also learn how to order tapas (bar snacks) and discover some of the best bars and cafes Barcelona has to offer. Plus, your friendly, informative guide can offer suggestions to help you get the most from your stay in Barcelona.

Do you want to gaze at the wide variety of flora and fauna of the Canarian archipelago? Plunge into the waters of the Atlantic Ocean and relish on the best diving activities at Gran Canaria. A refreshingly fun activity: an innovative way to discover the natural wealth of the island.
This full day sightseeing tour is ideal for anybody wishing to see the main attractions of Barcelona in a day
Discover the rich cultural heritage, gastronomy and leisure activities available in Barcelona without the worry of having to organize your trip. The Barcelona Card includes everything you need!
The ArTicket is a great all-in-one combination deal that gives access to six of the city's top museums
Dive into a day full of fun and water rides at Costa Caribe Aquatic Park and enjoy its fast and dizzying slides
strTitle: One Day Trip to Costa Caribe Aquatic Park from Barcelona

strIntroduction: Have a great day out with all the family at Barcelona Zoo, located in the heart of the city in the Parc de la Ciutadella.
Discover the magic of after-hours Barcelona with an amazing guided Vespa scooter tour of the city by night.

The Thyssen - Bornemisza Museum is part of the Golden Triangle of Art of Madrid, offering its outstanding family collection since 1982, located at the heart of the capital. Get to know The Avenue of Art in in all its splendour at the Thyssen - Bornemisza Museum.
Getting behind the wheel of a Ferrari or a Lamborghini is a luxurious adventure: Travel along a spectacular tour through Gran Canaria's highways on board a high performance car. Don't miss it!
strTitle: Scenic driving tour on a Ferrari or a Lamborghini - Gran Canaria

strIntroduction: Open your eyes to Ibiza’s magical underwater world that is sure to be the highlight of your Ibiza adventure. Tailored for beginners, this course is perfect for those who want to discover the dazzling array of fish and marine life waiting just below the surface of the glistening Mediterranean. We provide you with a safe and comfortable environment in which to improve your diving skills.
Visit Frigiliana and Nerja for a traditional taste of Andalusia. Learn about local history and culture and enjoy a day of wandering, exploring and some relaxation.

Join us on board the luxurious 'Supercat' and enjoy a whale watching experience in Gran Canaria. A unique and spectacular trip equipped with all the amenities so you get to know the island's marine fauna.
strTitle: 'Supercat' boat trip and whale watching - Gran Canaria

strIntroduction: Book your airport transfer from Madrid Airport to your centrally located Madrid hotel!
The ideal alternative to move around the Spanish capital: rent a scooter in Madrid and enjoy its cultural and artistic heritage. The most enjoyable way of doing tourism!

A break in nature while you enjoy your holiday. Wine Tasting in a tenth Century castle surrounded by gorgeous fields with jaw dropping views. A very intense experience in nature and the feeling of the past.
strTitle: Barcelona Wine Tour: Montserrat, Tapas and Wine

strIntroduction: Come and discover the subterranean world of the island of Ibiza in this tour of the spooky caves of Can Marça.
A sim card that that can travel around 11 different European countries and can fulfill all your needs like: high-speed net work, videos, internet calls, all which have unlimited flow rates!

Explore collections that provide a great overview of Picasso’s art at the Museo Picasso Málaga, located in the city of his birth. Admire more than 200 works by the creator of Cubism, and visit all the exciting temporary exhibitions.
A beautiful journey around the main villages and the southern coast of the island of Gran Canaria. Get to know its wonders beyond its beaches.
strTitle: The Little Venice of Gran Canaria: Mogán, Amadores and Mirador de las Dunas

strIntroduction: The one and only man VS bull sprinting battle! Are you ready for the biggest adrenaline rush and Spanish fiesta? Stay at a party campsite in Pamplona for the festival within the festival.
strTitle: Running of the Bulls: Pamplona, Spain

strIntroduction: Get to know the best offers of the Warner Park of Madrid, more than an amusement park, but the best wonderland ever!

strIntroduction: Do not miss Casa Patas' flamenco shows and its wide range of gastronomic offerings
strTitle: Flamenco Show at "Casa Patas" with dinner

strIntroduction: Don’t miss the opportunity to explore the secrets of the Mediterranean aboard a luxury catamaran.
Looking for something different to do on a Saturday afternoon? Fun, music, dancing and much more await on board a catamaran that takes you along the Costa del Sol.
Learn the secrets of Spanish cooking during a private Barcelona or Sitges cooking class.
strTitle: Barcelona PRIVATE cooking class at the chef’s house

strIntroduction: Enjoy a relaxing getaway from bustling Barcelona on this tour to Montserrat mountain and a visit to a winery.
strTitle: Barcelona Wine Tour: Montserrat, Tapas and Wine

strIntroduction: Discover the rich cultural heritage, the gastronomy and leisure activities available at the capital with the Madrid Card and make the most of your stay in Madrid by visiting the most breathtaking sights in its surroundings: The Real Monasterio de El Escorial or Toledo, the “City of Three Cultures”
strTitle: All Madrid - Madrid Card 24h Half day tour to Toledo or Real Monasterio del Escorial

strIntroduction: During this panoramic tour, you can discover the most spectacular buildings and monuments of Madrid, like Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor, the Avenue of Art and the Prado National Museum, and visit historic districts of the Spanish capital with a traditional touch.
strTitle: Panoramic Tour of Madrid and the Prado National Museum

strIntroduction: Discover the Royal past life of El Escorial and learn part of the recent Spanish history at the Valley of the Fallen. A unique and unforgettable day
strTitle: Royal Monastery of El Escorial and Valley of the Fallena

strIntroduction: Discover the variety of flamenco styles with an authentic show that appeals to the tradition and roots of the dance.

Soar over the intriguing island of Ibiza during an exhilarating 2-hour parasailing experience from San Antonio. Glide over the iridescent waves of the Mediterranean Sea on a sleek speedboat, then feel your adrenaline levels surge as your take to the skies and gaze down at the rugged peaks of mountains and the sandy curve of the coast. Choose to depart at sunset to make your experience even more magical and enjoy a complimentary drink as you watch the sun sink into the horizon.

A bus tour rich in history and canary culture going through Santa Lucia, Agüimes and Guayadaeque. An official guide will accompany you during the whole journey. What are you waiting for living new experiences?
strTitle: Caves of Guayadeque and Santa Lucia

strIntroduction: The Prado Museum is one of the top art galleries in the world; a wide, varied and magnificent collection, located at the Paseo del Prado in Madrid. Now, with priority access tickets!
strTitle: Prado Museum - skip the line tour

strIntroduction: Visit the mythical Santiago Bernabeu Stadium at your own pace, getting to know all its nooks and crannies as well as the legends you’ve only seen in photographs or on TV.
strTitle: Bernabéu Tour and Real Madrid Museum

strIntroduction: Discover the fascinating Vegueta quarter on this walking tour, which will show you the highlights of the old town and explain Christopher Columbus's activities here.
strTitle: Route through Monumental Vegueta Gran Canaria

strIntroduction: Want to enjoy a magical dining experience? A visit to 'La Castafiore' will not leave you disappointed: a mouth-watering meal in a warm and friendly setting, watching an operetta performed by true professionals.
strTitle: Dinner and Opera - 'La Castafiore' Restaurant - Madrid

strIntroduction: Set around traditional Al-Ándalus architecture, and enjoy the wonderful Turkish baths. It will be the best way to refresh yourself in Madrid.

Perched dramatically on a steep gorge, the historic town of Ronda is choc-a-bloc with sights, attractions and culture. Approached through breath-taking, hilly countryside, Ronda is an enchanting destination for a guided excursion.

Join us and on this full day tour of the ancient town of Tangier, just a short boat ride across the Straits of Gibraltar. Indulge in the exotic sights and sounds of this enchanting North African city.
A fun team work activity in the city center of Barcelona with different tests and tastings. For team building, ice breaking, fun or… just because!
strTitle: Wine and Tapas Scavenger Hunt in Barcelona

strIntroduction: Have an enjoyable and entertaining day at PortAventura: go on 40 rides, go all over exotic places and enjoy magical shows
strTitle: One Day Trip to PortAventura from Barcelona

strIntroduction: Your first contact with the wonders that hides the sea.How to know if you want to be a diver if you've never tried? Are you willing to live one of the most exciting experiences of your life? To breathe under water like a fish?

The CDLN pool party at Hostal CDLN (opposite Sankeys) runs night time from 9pm – midnight (best after boat or before clubbing) . Your e-ticket includes open bar (all drinks), char-grilled BBQ and a wide range of side dishes.

Discover 3 of Catalonia's most iconic wineries with your local guide in the Penedes Wine Region! Learn how different varieties of wine are produced and have the opportunity to taste them! First we will visit the award-winning Bodegues Jean Leon in central Penedes where we will do two wine tastings. Then head to Bodegues Torres to learn more about wine production, followed by a wine tasting of three wines, as well as three local cheeses. Finally, visit Caves Freixenet learning about the process of making cava. You’ll sample two cavas with delicious tapas.
strTitle: Wine and Cava Day Trip from Barcelona

strIntroduction: Discover one of the monuments par excellence of Madrid with skip-the-line access with the Madrid Card Royal Palace. Delight as well on all the free services and discounts that the city’s official tourist card provides: the Madrid Card. A great visit and intelligent tourism at its best!
A unique cooking class in one of the exclusive gastronomic societies of San Sebastian with visit to la Bretxa food market with your expert local chef.
strTitle: Gastronomic Society cooking class in San Sebastian

strIntroduction: Take a step back in time and discover one of Spain’s greatest treasures, the Alhambra of Granada.

Get the keys to the city of Madrid and save time and money with a Madrid Card. Skip the lines in main museums, and learn about the Spanish capital's cultural heritage. Enjoy discounts in stores and restaurants as an added bonus.

Travel from Madrid on a full-day trip to the imperial city of Toledo, one of Europe’s oldest cities and home to famous works by El Greco. Tour the Gothic cathedral, and see the Church of Santo Tome, the former synagogue of Santa Maria la Blanca, and more.
strTitle: Toledo: Full-Day Guided Bus Tour from Madrid

strIntroduction: Rub shoulders with celebs, sports stars and royalty during a visit to the Madrid Wax Museum.

Release you inner Tarzan at Aventura Amazonia with an experience that will have you hanging, jumping, swinging and flying from the treetops. The adventure park is located in Elviria, just 500 metres from the sea at Marbella and allows you to try out 67 activities on five routes during at least three hours of fun.
A night of illusions, comedy and singing awaits at Torremolinos’ one and only Chamber of Secrets!
